titleStmt.title: Sir Phillip Stapleton his worthy speech in the House of Commons in Parliament, Ian. 15. 1641. Concerning the accusation of the Lord Digby and Colonell Lunsford of high treason.
titleStmt.author: Stapleton, Philip, Sir, 1603-1647.

notesStmt.note: Title page contains device of star with two layers of five points each.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
